title: Borderlands 3 Reviews Are In - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.09.19
description:
Get started with the Hims complete hair kit for just $5 today right now while supplies last by going to http://forhims.com/GAMESDAILY. 

Get 20% off and free shipping with the code GAMES at http://Manscaped.com.

Quip starts at just $25 and if you go to http://getquip.com/GAMES right now, you can get your first refill pack for FREE.

Andrea joins Tim for the last time to talk about Borderlands 3, Nintendo's latest patents, Resident Evil, and more!

00:02:12 - Housekeeping
It’s Andrea’s final week! Tuesday with Whitta, Wednesday with Greg, and her final Gamescast Wednesday afternoon on patreon.com/kindafunnygames.
Destiny 2’s Luke Smith is on We Have Cool Friends today. Catch it on youtube.com/kindafunny or podcast services today.
Friend of the show Anthony Carboni is streaming Dreamcast games for the console’s 20th anniversary over on twitch.tv/AnthonyCarboni. He’s raising money for Still Kickin, a nonprofit that helps awesome people who are going through awful things.
The Roper Report   -
00:03:33 - Borderlands 3 Review Round-Up
00:08:49 - Resident Evil Project Resistance Teased
00:15:45 - Nintendo patent shows curved Joy-Con design
00:21:20 - Is it an X button or Cross button?
00:26:32 - “Who cares?” - The Nano Biologist
00:27:59 - Out today
00:35:05 -  Hims
00:36:20 - Manscaped
00:37:43 - Quip
Reader mail   -
00:39:50 - “Today is the 20th anniversary of the Dreamcast…” - Borzen00
00:44:32 - “Do you think we will see any gaming news at tomorrow's iphone conference?” - Evan M
00:53:53 - “What advice would you give yourself?” - 2038 Pokémon CEO
01:01:31 - You’re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Andrea & Whitta
